string.text: Isnuje aktyŭny kvest, jaki pieraškadžaje hetamu!
Hetaja vajna doŭžycca niedastatkova, kab viesci pieramovy! Prajšło tolki {ELAPSED_DAYS} dzion z {REQUIRED_DAYS} patrebnych.
Nielha abviascić mir z hetym haspadarstvam.
Pasłannik ad {FACTION1_NAME} prybudzie da {HERO_NAME} z {FACTION2_NAME} ciaham {TRAVEL_TIME} dzion.
Vy zachapili {SETTLEMENT_NAME}, tamu majecie prava pieršaj admovy. Žadajecie vaładaryć nad hetaj vołasciu?
Vy nie možacie daryć vołasci svajmu ŭłasnamu kłanu.
Vy nie zjaŭlajeciesia lidaram vašaha haspadarstva.
Vy nie majecie vołasciaŭ, jakija lha padaryć.
Darennie vołasciaŭ kłanu ŭ vašym haspadarstvie
Vy nie možacie daryć vołasci kłanam najmitaŭ.
Vy vajavali zanadta niadaŭna, kab razhladać chaŭrus. Prajšło tolki {ELAPSED_DAYS} dzion z {REQUIRED_DAYS} patrebnych.
Hetaja frakcyja nie zacikaŭlena ŭ farmavanni chaŭrusu z vami.
Hety chaŭrus nie praisnavaŭ zadoŭha, kab razhladać mahčymasć jaho razryvu! Prajšło tolki {ELAPSED_DAYS} dzion z {REQUIRED_DAYS} patrebnych.
Nielha abviascić mir z haspadarstvam padčas abłohi aktyŭnaha hulca.
Nie moža mieć aktyŭny pakt pra nienapad.
Haspadarstva {KINGDOM} prapanoŭvaje pakt pra nienapad z haspadarstvam {PLAYER_KINGDOM}.
Sfarmavać pakt pra nienapad na {PACT_DURATION_DAYS} dzion.
Haspadarstva {ALLIED_KINGDOM} dałučajecca da svaich chaŭrusnikaŭ, haspadarstva {KINGDOM}, u vajnie suprać haspadarstva {ENEMY_KINGDOM}.
Pakt pra nienapad pamiž haspadarstvami {KINGDOM} i {OTHER_KINGDOM} praterminavany.
Hetaja frakcyja nie zacikaŭlena ŭ farmavanni z vami pakta pra nienapad.
Kalradyja ŭsio bolej ascierahajecca biazlitasnaha rasšyrennia haspadarstva {EXPANSIONIST_KINGDOM}. Dla zmahannia z im była sfarmavana kaalicyja na čale z haspadarstvam {COALITION_KINGDOM}!
Haspadarstva {KINGDOM} sfarmavała a pakt pra nienapad z haspadarstvam {OTHER_KINGDOM}.
Kab adbłakavać hetaje dziejannie, vy pavinny prasunucca dalej u hałoŭnym kvescie. Vy možacie adklučyć abaronu siužetnaj linii ŭ naładach moda.
Uzurpavaŭšy hety tron, vy biarecie na siabie abaviazak {STANCE} Impieryju ŭ hałoŭnaj siužetnaj linii.
Vam brakuje aŭtaryteta, kab vykanać hetaje dziejannie.

Vašyja vojski i narod zniasileny kanfliktam z haspadarstvam {ENEMY_KINGDOM} i admovilisia ad zmahannia. Vy musicie pryniać umovy parazy i vypłacić vajskovuju daninu {DENARS} denaraŭ. Hańba parazy taksama budzie kaštavać {INFLUENCE} upłyvu.

Kali vašy apošni zamak paŭ pad naciskam vorahaŭ, vy bolej nie možacie praciahvać zmahannie z haspadarstvam {ENEMY_KINGDOM}. Vy musicie pryniać umovy parazy i vypłacić vajskovuju daninu {DENARS} denaraŭ. Hańba parazy taksama budzie kaštavać {INFLUENCE} upłyvu.
Zniasilenaje vajnoj haspadarstva {KINGDOM} prapanoŭvaje mir haspadarstvu {PLAYER_KINGDOM}.
Minimalnaja praciahłasć (u dniach), jakuju moža doŭžycca vajna da abjavy miru. Značennie pa zmaŭčanni - 10.
Minimalnaja praciahłasć (u dniach) dla abjavy vajny pasla abjavy miru. Značennie pa zmaŭčanni - 100.
Uklučyć Kantrol Hulca nad Dypłamatyjaj Haspadarstva
Daje hulcu poŭny kantrol nad abjavami vajny i miru svajho haspadarstva. Značennie pa zmaŭčanni - nie.
Dazvolić Hulcu Atrymlivać Zachoplenyja Im Sieliščy
Daje hulcu mahčymasć atrymać sielišča, jakoje jon zachapiŭ, zamiest vyznačennia ŭłasnika sielišča šlacham hałasavannia.
The minimum duration (in days) that an alliance can last. Default value is 10.
The duration (in days) that a non-aggression pact will last. Default value is 100.
Score modifier affecting the tendency of kingdoms to form non-aggression pacts. Increasing the modifier makes non-aggression pacts more desirable to AI kingdoms. Default value is 0.
Score modifier affecting the tendency of kingdoms to form alliances. Increasing the modifier makes alliances more desirable to AI kingdoms. Default value is 0.
If disabled, this removes all costs for war and peace declaration actions. Default value is true.
If enabled, this will scale influence costs based on your kingdom size. Otherwise, flat influence costs are used. Default value is true.
Multiplier for the scaling influence costs. Default value is 5.
Influence cost for declaring war on another kingdom. Default value is 100.
Influence cost for making peace with another kingdom. Default value is 100.
Gold cost for sending a messenger to another character. Default value is 100.
The amount of time (in days) a messenger takes to reach a kingdoms leader. Default value is 3.
If disabled, this disables the war exhaustion mechanic. Default value is enabled.
The amount of war exhaustion added per day a war is ongoing. Default value is 1.0.
The amount of war exhaustion added when a faction has a battle casualty. Default value is 0.01.
The amount of war exhaustion added when a faction loses a city. Default value is 10.0.
Enable Player War Exhaustion Debug Messages
Enables debug messages for war exhaustion added to the player kingdom. Default value is false.
The amount of war exhaustion that forces a faction to propose peace. Default value is 100.0.
The amount of war exhaustion added when a factions village is raided. Default value is 3.0.
The amount of war exhaustion decay per day the factions are at peace. Default value is 2.0.
Scaling War Reparations Gold Cost Multiplier
Multiplier for the scaling of war reparations gold costs. Default value is 100.
If disabled, this disables the ability to form alliances for both player and AI kingdoms. Default value is enabled.
Multiplier for the relation gain when granting fiefs. Default value is 1.
The relation penalty assessed when granting a fief to another clan. Default value is -2.
Enables influence balancing. May need to be disabled for mod compatibility.
Enables influence decay, which gradually decays influence each day. Default value is enabled.
The amount of influence exempt from influence decay. Default value is 1000.
The maximum amount of daily influence loss. Default value is 20.
The percentage of influence that decays away per day. Default value is 2.0.
Enables corruption, which gradually decays a clans influence each day when holding too many fiefs. Default value is enabled.
The minimum amount of expansionism a fief contributes. Default value is 3.
Expanionism added per successful siege. Default value is 20.
The amount of expansionism that decays each day. Default value is 1.
Enables coalitions, which allow factions to band together against a strong, expansionist faction. Default value is enabled.
The amount of expansionism a faction requires before a coalition is formed against it. Default value is 100.
The percentage change of a coalition forming against a faction over the expansionism threshold. Default value is 5.
When enabled, prevents the player from breaking the main storyline. Disable when using mods like "Just Let Me Play". Default value is true.
When enabled, this allows the player to usurp the throne of a kingdom. This feature is unbalanced and is pending a rework and thus not recommended. Default value is false.
